Package org.joml

Class Spheref

java.lang.Object
org.joml.Spheref
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Externalizable, java.io.Serializable
public class Spheref
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Externalizable
Represents a 3D sphere.
Author:
Kai Burjack
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    float r
    The sphere's radius.
    float x
    The x coordinate of the sphere's center.
    float y
    The y coordinate of the sphere's center.
    float z
    The z coordinate of the sphere's center.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Spheref()
    Create a new Spheref with center position (0, 0, 0) and radius = 0.
    Spheref​(float x, float y, float z, float r)
    Create a new Spheref with center position (x, y, z) and radius r.
    Spheref​(Spheref source)
    Create a new Spheref as a copy of the given source.
    Spheref​(Vector3fc c, float r)
    Create a new Spheref with center position c and radius r.

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Return a string representation of this sphere.

      This method creates a new DecimalFormat on every invocation with the format string "0.000E0;-".

      Overrides:
      toString in class java.lang.Object
      Returns:
      the string representation
